import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import { pageTitle } from '../../../helper'; import Div from '../../Div'; import Spacing from '../../Spacing'; import React ,{useState , useContext , useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' const initialeState ={ username:'', email:'', password:'', role:'', _id : '' } function UpdateUser() { const [User , setUser] = useState(initialeState) return ( <>
{onEdit ? :''}
) } export default UpdateUser
